Hint.Options - Enum in org.netbeans.spi.java.hints

HintContext - Class in org.netbeans.spi.java.hints
 
HintContext.MessageKind - Enum in org.netbeans.spi.java.hints
 
HintSeverity - Enum in org.netbeans.spi.java.hints
Severity of hint ERROR - will show up as error WARNING - will show up as warning CURRENT_LINE_WARNING - will only show up when the caret is placed in the erroneous element
